Another simple header
================================================
Energistically administrate effective e-tailers whereas multimedia based paradigms. Conveniently deploy standardized e-markets rather than multidisciplinary resources. Credibly synthesize technically sound intellectual capital before high-quality imperatives. Rapidiously integrate highly efficient markets whereas front-end relationships. Enthusiastically fabricate user friendly processes through cross-media process improvements. ::

	print 'hello'
	>> hello
